profile.name: Md Rakib
profile.title: Flutter Developer
profile.bio: I am a passionate Flutter developer with 1+ years of experience in building high-quality mobile applications and modern user interfaces. Specialized in creating scalable cross-platform solutions with a focus on seamless user experience.

projects.title: Levaro – Service Marketplace Application
projects.description: Service provider & service booking platform where providers can create profiles, publish services, and manage requests.
projects.details:
Levaro is a sophisticated marketplace platform designed to bridge the gap between service providers and consumers. As a lead Flutter developer, I implemented a dual-app architecture within a single codebase. 

Key features include:
• Dynamic Profile Creation: Providers can showcase their expertise, portfolio, and pricing.
• Real-time Service Management: Instant updates for service listings and availability.
• Booking Flow: A streamlined end-to-end booking process with status tracking (Pending, Accepted, Ongoing, Completed).
• Interactive Dashboard: Comprehensive insights for both consumers and providers to manage their interactions efficiently.

The app emphasizes performance through optimized state management and a responsive design that ensures a premium feel across both Android and iOS devices.

projects.title: Neowash – Car Wash Booking Application
projects.description: On-demand car wash booking app allowing users to select car type, model, date, and time.
projects.details:
Neowash revolutionizes the traditional car wash experience by bringing it to the user's fingertips. This application focuses on high-precision scheduling and customization.

Technological Highlights:
• Intelligent Categorization: Users can select specific car types (Sedan, SUV, Hatchback) and models, with the app dynamically calculating service duration and pricing.
• Calendar Integration: A robust time-slot booking system that prevents overbooking and ensures service provider efficiency.
• Location Services: Integrated map functionality for users to locate nearby service zones or set their own location for home services.
• Push Notifications: Stay updated with real-time alerts regarding booking status and upcoming service reminders.

The UI was crafted using custom animations and a sleek 'glassmorphism' aesthetic to provide a modern, high-tech experience for automotive enthusiasts.

projects.title: Money Saving App – Personal Finance Management
projects.description: Expense and savings tracking app with bill payment reminders and budgeting tools.
projects.details:
The Money Saving App is a personal financial companion designed to promote better saving habits and financial literacy. It simplifies complex financial tracking into an intuitive daily routine.

Core Functionality:
• Automated Tracking: Seamlessly record income and expenses with categorized breakdown (Food, Rent, Entertainment, etc.).
• Budget Planning: Set monthly or weekly limits for different categories with visual progress indicators.
• Data Visualization: Implemented advanced charting libraries to show spending patterns over time, helping users identify where they can save.
• Bill Reminders: Never miss a payment with custom notification scheduling for recurring bills.
• Secure Storage: Utilized local encrypted storage for sensitive financial data, ensuring user privacy.

This project showcased my ability to handle complex data structures and state management while maintaining a clean, distraction-free user interface.

experience.description:
• Developed and deployed live mobile applications.
• Integrated Firebase authentication, real-time database, and APIs.
• Collaborated with backend and UI/UX teams.

education.description: Focus on communication systems, electronics, and software integration.
